original: Bergelin, Torsten Folke Ludvig, rektor, Gränna, f. 4/6/10 i Lund av fd. bantktj :m. Osisian B. o. Ragnhild Johansson. G. 44 m. Birgit EkvalL Barn: Margareta f. 45, Ingrid 46. — Stud:ex. i Lund 28, fil. kand. i Lund 37, fil. mag. i Lund 39. Tj’g. v. Hälsingborgs h. a. 1. f. fl. 37, Borås h. a. 1. 38, Vara samrealsk. 38, Ånge h. folksk. 39, Gränna h. folksk. 40, ämneslär. där 44-46, rektor sed. 46.
translated: Bergelin, Torsten Folke Ludvig, principal, Gränna, b. 6/4/1910 in Lund to former band conductor Osisian B. and Ragnhild Johansson. Married in 1944 to Birgit EkvalL. Children: Margareta b. 1945, Ingrid b. 1946. Completed high school in Lund in 1928, received bachelor's degree from Lund in 1937 and master's degree in Lund in 1939. Worked as a teacher at Hälsingborgs h. a. 1. and others from 1937, at Borås h. a. 1. in 1938, at Vara samrealsk. in 1938, at Ånge h. folksk. in 1939, at Gränna h. folksk. in 1940, became subject teacher there from 1944-1946 and has been a principal since 1946.
